socketedItems.secDescrText: Desecrates the ground, summoning corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area. The corpses will be chosen from the monsters in the current area and any Spectres that have existed in this instance.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Consumes a corpse, granting all of your minions the power to block both attacks and spells. The skill consumes other nearby corpses, increasing the duration for each corpse consumed.
explicitMods: Additional 1.00 seconds Base Duration per extra corpse Consumed
Grants Minions +35% Chance to Block Attack Damage
Grants Minions +35% Chance to Block Spell Damage
Grants Minions 4% of Life Regenerated per Second if they have Blocked recently
